message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I believe it's worth every penny, but I'm open to negotiations. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $12000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $9000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $10500. It's a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $10500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm fairly compensated. I'm counteroffering at $10200. It's a good price, considering the product's value and the time we're taking to negotiate. What do you think?

I understand your concerns, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to make concessions. However, $10200 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm counteroffering at $10100. It's a fair price, considering the product's value and the time we've spent discussing it. What do you think?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm offering $9750 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm not quite ready to meet you at $9750, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm counteroffering at $10050. It's a fair price, considering the product's value and the time we've spent negotiating. What do you think?

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $9500. I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement. I'm making one final offer of $9500 for the product. If you're not willing to accept, I'll consider buying it from John for $10000.
